description.raw:
Currently several files are recompiled for every test. This pull request creates a static library and links to each test to reduce compilation time. Even with ccache, it still reduces build time by 9%. I have another pull request in the pipeline that will reduce build time by 30% (even with ccache) when tests are enabled; this is just part 1.

UPDATE: I added another piece to this, which moves code from ServerFixture.hh to ServerFixture.cc. I tried to minimize changes to the code. This gives an additional 10% speed-up for me (about 20% total).

UPDATE: Found a cmake bug, in which cmake would re-link if libserver_fixture.a changed. I linked to the absolute path of the library in ae05a9c and that fixed it.
